item.title: 美联储降息希望渺茫，市场避险情绪高涨
item.description: 由于美国政府关门，美联储政策制定者无法获得关键数据，他们只能盲目行事，这种不确定性正在考验投资者的神经。【原文：Federal Reserve policymakers are flying blind after the US government shutdown starved them of crucial data, and the uncertainty is testing the nerves of investors.】

item.title: 香蕉对关税和通货膨胀的启示
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 塑造播客行业的人眼中的播客行业现状
item.description:
行业领导者对从 Netflix 的中庸诱惑到人工智能值得商榷的影响等各种问题进行了权衡

。【原文：

Industry leaders weigh in on everything from the middling allure of Netflix to the debatable impact of AI

】

item.title: 在人工智能信贷 "过剩 "之际，橡树看到了资产支持债券的价值
item.description: 随着企业信贷需求的飙升，橡树资本管理公司发现了房地产和混合债务的价值。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management is finding value in real estate and hybrid debt as demand for corporate credit soars.】

item.title: 纽瓦克机场改造取决于价值 450 亿美元的港务局计划
item.description: 作为纽约和新泽西港务局周四公布的拟议 450 亿美元基本建设计划的一部分，纽瓦克自由国际机场预计将进行大修。【原文：Newark Liberty International Airport is expected to get a major facelift as part of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey’s proposed $45 billion capital plan released Thursday.】

item.title: 日本航空公司在地区机队大修中寻求多达 70 架喷气机
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本航空公司（Japan Airlines Co., Ltd.）已向制造商征集多达 70 架支线飞机和涡轮螺旋桨飞机的计划书，以替换服务于大都市以外地区的国内机队。【原文：Japan Airlines Co. has sought proposals from manufacturers for up to 70 regional and turboprop aircraft to replace a domestic fleet that services areas outside major metropolitan regions, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 穆拉提的思维机器公司正在进行价值 500 亿美元的融资谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由 OpenAI 前高管米拉-穆拉提（Mira Murati）创办的人工智能初创公司 Thinking Machines Lab 正在进行新一轮融资的早期谈判，估值约为 500 亿美元。【原文：Thinking Machines Lab, an artificial intelligence startup founded by former OpenAI executive Mira Murati, is in early talks to raise a new round of funding at a roughly $50 billion valuation, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 西门子能源发布涡轮机和数据中心需求展望
item.description: 由于燃气轮机和数据中心设备的需求以及 Gamesa 风力涡轮机部门的重组进展，西门子能源股份公司大幅上调了中期财务目标。【原文：Siemens Energy AG substantially hiked its mid-term financial targets on the back of demand for gas turbines and data center equipment as well as restructuring progress in its Gamesa wind turbine unit.】

item.title: 美国可转债以 1,090 亿美元的规模刷新科威德纪录
item.description: 最近几个月的新一轮交易浪潮推动美国可转换债券市场今年的交易量创下新高，甚至超过了大流行病时期的狂热活动。【原文：A fresh wave of deals in recent months has propelled the US convertible market to record volume this year, eclipsing even the pandemic-era frenzy of activity.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利不支持上一次减息，对 12 月份的减息举棋不定
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）表示，他不支持美国央行上一次降息，尽管他仍未决定在 12 月份的政策会议上采取何种最佳行动方案。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said he didn’t support the US central bank’s last interest-rate cut, though he’s still undecided on the best course of action for its December policy meeting.】

item.title: 美国联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）考虑就代币化存款保险制定指导意见
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.【原文：The head of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp. said the regulator is working on guidance for tokenized deposit insurance, a move that would help steer financial institutions that want to broaden their footprint in digital assets.】

item.title: 比特币跌破 100,000 美元，熊市笼罩加密货币
item.description: 在新一轮避险情绪和科技股大跌重燃华尔街恐慌情绪的拖累下，比特币进一步跌破 100,000 美元大关。【原文：Bitcoin sank deeper below the $100,000 mark, dragged down by a fresh wave of risk aversion and a selloff in tech stocks that reignited Wall Street jitters.】

item.title: 日本芯片业财报显示人工智能需求旺盛，汽车业不景气
item.description: 随着数据中心需求的激增，芯片制造商和设备供应商纷纷上调业绩预期，人工智能推动日本科技行业实现了超预期的盈利。【原文：Artificial intelligence fueled a stronger-than-expected earnings season for Japan’s tech sector, with surging data-center demand prompting chipmakers and equipment suppliers to raise forecasts.】

item.title: 万豪酒店因 Sonder 清盘而受到被赶走客人的抨击
item.description: 对于万豪国际集团这样的酒店公司来说，新客房就是一切。【原文：For hotel companies like Marriott International Inc., new rooms are everything.】

item.title: 与 CoreWeave 绑定的数据中心债务考验充斥市场的实力
item.description: 应用数字公司（Applied Digital Corp. ）将以 2025 年美国市场第二大折扣价发售其价值 23.5 亿美元的垃圾债券，因为该交易一直在努力吸引投资者的需求。【原文：Applied Digital Corp. is offering its $2.35 billion junk bond at what would be the US market’s second-biggest discount of 2025, as the deal has struggled to generate investor demand.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）项目即将结束，加纳誓言巩固经济成果
item.description: 加纳政府在准备退出与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）为期三年的救助计划之际，承诺维持财政纪律。【原文：Ghana’s government pledged to maintain fiscal discipline as it prepares to exit a three-year bailout program with the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: Pimco 全球信贷首席信息官马克-基塞尔将离职 29 年
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Mark Kiesel, Pacific Investment Management Co.’s chief investment officer for global credit, is stepping down from the firm.】

item.title: 特朗普达成协议后，康奈尔大学准备出售创纪录的 10 亿美元债券
item.description: 康奈尔大学正准备出售创纪录的 10 亿美元债券，在此之前，该校董事会已同意借入多达 17 亿美元的新债，因为大学继续面临来自联邦政府的资金压力。【原文：Cornell University is preparing a record $1 billion bond sale after the school’s trustees signed off on borrowing as much as $1.7 billion of new debt, as universities continue to face funding pressures from the federal government.】

item.title: 特朗普计划明年参加达沃斯论坛，为瑞士打气
item.description: 据熟悉美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划的人士透露，他预计将出席明年在达沃斯举行的世界经济论坛年会，这表明随着美瑞两国接近达成贸易协议，两国关系正在升温。【原文：US President Donald Trump is expected to attend the World Economic Forum’s annual meeting in Davos next year, according to people familiar with his planning, signaling warming US-Swiss relations as the nations close in on a trade deal.】

item.title: 苹果公司旨在通过新计划利用迷你应用程序趋势
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：Apple Inc. introduced a new program Thursday that lets the iPhone maker collect revenue from mini apps and games within larger “super apps,” an attempt to capitalize on a growing trend among software developers.】

item.title: IFM 正在谈判为绿色集团交易筹集 20 亿美元债务
item.description: 知情人士透露，IFM Investors Pty 正在洽谈举债融资，以支持其对瑞士数据中心运营商 Green Group AG 的收购，融资金额约为 16 亿瑞士法郎（20 亿美元）。【原文：IFM Investors Pty is in talks to raise about 1.6 billion Swiss francs ($2 billion) in debt to back its acquisition of Swiss data center operator Green Group AG, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美联储哈马克称利率仍应影响经济
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）表示，美国央行应保持利率稳定，以继续降低通胀。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said the US central bank should hold rates steady to keep reducing inflation.】

item.title: 比特币拥趸杰克-多西（Jack Dorsey）投入稳定币支付热潮
item.description: 杰克-多西（Jack Dorsey）正在向受监管的数字货币的崛起屈服。这位比特币极致主义者长期以来一直认为加密货币可以支撑日常支付，现在他正引导 Block Inc.【原文：Jack Dorsey is capitulating to the rise of regulated digital dollars. The Bitcoin maximalist who long argued the cryptocurrency could anchor everyday payments is now steering Block Inc.’s Cash App to support stablecoins, marking a sharp break for a company that built its crypto identity around Bitcoin purity.】

item.title: 米莱寻求通过放宽冰川规则加速阿根廷铜业繁荣
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊正计划修改保护安第斯冰川的法规，以释放数百亿美元的采矿投资。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei is planning to modify regulations that protect Andean glaciers in order to unlock tens of billions of dollars of mining investments, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 博鳌亚洲论坛称，随着停摆后数据回归，美元将震荡上扬
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）称，在创纪录的政府关门结束后，随着美国经济数据的恢复，外汇市场将重现波动。【原文：Volatility is set to return to foreign-exchange markets as US economic data resumes following the end of the record government shutdown, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 人工智能编码领导者 Cursor 收购帮助初创企业招聘人才的公司
item.description: Cursor 是一家快速发展的人工智能编码初创公司，它正在收购一家曾帮助 OpenAI 等领先人工智能公司开展招聘工作的公司，这是科技行业人才争夺战日趋激烈的最新迹象。【原文：Cursor, a fast-growing artificial intelligence coding startup, is buying a firm that has helped support leading AI companies like OpenAI in their own recruiting efforts, the latest sign of an increasingly fierce talent war in the technology industry.】

item.title: 加拿大顶级养老金在收益不均后重整增长型股权投资
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）正在对一项专注于高增长公司的私募股权投资战略进行改革，因为该战略取得的成果喜忧参半。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board is revamping a private equity strategy that focuses on high-growth companies after getting mixed results in the strategy, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Fireblocks 正在为回购员工持股筹集资金进行谈判
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，由红杉资本（Sequoia Capital）和Coatue管理公司（Coatue Management）支持的加密基础设施公司Fireblocks Inc.【原文：Fireblocks Inc., the crypto infrastructure company backed by Sequoia Capital and Coatue Management, is in talks to raise money to buy back shares from employees, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Desmarais 家族的电力公司现金堆积，寻求更多交易
item.description: 加拿大电力公司（Power Corp. of Canada）公布了强劲的收益，并表示正在寻找更多的收购机会，公司股价因此飙升至创纪录水平。【原文：Shares of Power Corp. of Canada surged to a record after the company posted strong earnings and said it’s on the hunt for more acquisitions.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称正努力完成塞内加尔债务审查
item.description: 国际货币基金组织正在对塞内加尔的债务进行审查，谈判将在未来几周内继续进行。【原文：The International Monetary Fund is working on its review of Senegal’s debt and negotiations will continue in the coming weeks.】
